message: Hello Bob, I am offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. Could you do $11,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $11,000.  Would you consider $12,500?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $11,750?
